nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor opens, then turn on the Hallway Light.
original_prompt: If the front door opens, then turn on the hallway light.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor opens, then send a notification to the homeowner.
original_prompt: If the front door opens, then send a notification to the homeowner.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock becomes unlocked, then send a notification to my phone.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked, then send a notification to the homeowner.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock becomes unlocked, then turn on the Hallway Light.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked, then turn on the porch light.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor closes and the time is after 10:00 PM, then lock the Front Door Lock.
original_prompt: If the front door is closed and it is after 10 pm, then lock the front door.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor closes and the time is between 10:00 PM and 6:00 AM, then lock the Front Door Lock.
original_prompt: If the front door is closed and it is between the hours of 10:00 PM and 6:00 AM, then lock the front door.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock becomes unlocked and it is after sunset, then turn on the Hallway Light.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked after sunset, then turn on the porch lights.

nl_prompt: If the sun sets while the Front Door Contact Sensor is closed and the Front Door Lock is locked, then turn on the Hallway Light.
original_prompt: If the front door is closed and locked and the sun sets, then turn on the porch light.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock is unlocked and motion is detected by the Hallway Motion Sensor, then turn on the Hallway Light.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked and motion is active on the front porch motion sensor, then turn on the entryway light.

nl_prompt: If motion is detected by the Hallway Motion Sensor and the Front Door Lock is unlocked, then turn on the Hallway Light for 5 minutes.
original_prompt: If motion is detected by the front door motion sensor and the door lock is unlocked, then turn on the porch light for 5 minutes.

nl_prompt: If motion is detected by the Hallway Motion Sensor after sunset, then turn on the Hallway Light for 5 minutes.
original_prompt: If motion is detected by the front door sensor and it is after sunset, then turn on the porch light for 5 minutes.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor stays open for more than 5 minutes, then turn off the Hallway Light.
original_prompt: If the front door is open for more than 5 minutes, then turn off the hallway light.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor opens and User Presence is not present, then turn on the Hallway Light.
original_prompt: If the front door opens and the presence sensor is not detected, then turn on the hallway lights.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor opens while Location Mode is set to Away, then send a notification to the homeowner.
original_prompt: If the front door contact sensor is opened and the mode is set to "away," then send a notification to the homeowner's mobile phone.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock becomes unlocked while Location Mode is set to Away, then send a notification to the homeowner.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked and the current location mode is "Away," then send a notification to the homeowner's phone.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Contact Sensor opens while Location Mode is Away, then turn on the Main Alarm Siren and send a notification.
original_prompt: If the front door is opened while the alarm is set to away mode, then set off the siren and send a notification to the homeowner's phone.

nl_prompt: If User Presence becomes not present and Location Mode is set to Away, then turn off the Hallway Light and lock the Front Door Lock.
original_prompt: If everyone leaves the house and the location mode is set to 'Away', then turn off all lights and lock the front door.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock remains unlocked for more than 5 minutes, then send a notification.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked for more than 5 minutes, then send an SMS to the homeowner alerting them of the issue.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock becomes unlocked and the time is 10:00 PM, then turn off the Hallway Light and lock the Front Door Lock.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked and it is 10 PM, then turn off all lights and lock the front door.

nl_prompt: If the Front Door Lock becomes unlocked after 9:00 PM, then turn on the Hallway Light and send a notification.
original_prompt: If the front door is unlocked after 9pm, then turn on the entryway light and send a notification.
